data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: My best friend William has a typical Asian look. He has a youthful appearance, and thus he looks young for his age. He has a pair of round and big eyes, and his pupils are black. He has a fair complexion and short black hair. He is not that tall, possibly below average height. Besides, he hits the gym on a regular basis, so he is rather muscular, which makes him look quite stocky. Even wearing thick clothes, you can tell that he is keeping a good shape. And he looks extremely smart when he wears a shirt, which I admire a lot. (102字)
data.referenceText: Describe a person you know. What does he or she look like?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一个你认识的人。他或她长什么样?
